archimate:TriggeringRelationship.name: Flight service order
archimate:TriggeringRelationship.documentation:
Flight details: - flight # - airline name - airplane: + vendor + model + year issued + details - scheduled arrival: + date and time + terminal - passanger service: + bus + teleport - ground data: + landing zone
Next flight: - scheduled departure: + date and time + terminal + flight distance
Airplane service: - required: yes - service items: + fuel + cleaning + catering
Service priority: high/normal/low
